name: RPCalander
author: Taako
description: A cog for managing an RP calendar with daily updates.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the RPCalander cog! Use `[p]rpca` for commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores local data in the form of a `post_tracker.json` file to track the last post timestamp. No end user data is stored or shared.
